title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
1 point maximum

Proposal (1 point)

· Increase in lactate levels are due to fermentation/anaerobic metabolism
descriptions:

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
2 points maximum

Description (points may be earned from only one category)

0-20 minutes (1 point)

Oxygen levels start high and decline steadily

Oxygen levels start and remain high

After 20 minutes (1 point)

Oxygen levels decline more slowly or remain flat

Oxygen levels decline

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
1 point maximum

Proposal (1 point)

· The (genetic/heritable) capacity to sustain dives for longer periods of time provides selective/reproductive advantages (access to food/avoidance of predators) for seals but not for penguins.
descriptions:
Student response earns none of the available points.
